mapper.sql: SELECT BNO , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER , VIEW_CNT , COMMENT_CNT , REG_DATE FROM T_BOARD
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_BOARD WHERE bno = #{bno} AND WRITER = #{writer}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BOARD (bno, title, CONTENT, WRITER) VALUES (seq_board_num.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC, BNO DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
